title: Advanced Diploma in Heat Exchangers: Fundamentals and Design Analysis
headline: In this free online course, learn about the design and network analysis involved in heat exchangers and regenerators.
description: In this free online course, learn about heat exchangers, their importance and how they're used in different industries. You will explore the design and analysis of different types of heat exchangers and regenerators. This course will be of interest to mechanical engineering students or design professionals. Boost your mechanical engineering knowledge and skills, by studying this comprehensive course.
courseDescription:
In this free online course, you are introduced to the world of heat exchangers, where you will explore the design and analysis of different types of heat exchangers and regenerators. Calculations, problems, examples and assessment questions in this instructor-led video-based course, are designed to provide you with a comprehensive foundation, which will enable you to progress further into this area as a career.

The course begins by introducing you to different types of heat exchangers. Then their various applications across different industries are covered. You will explore the enhancement of heat transfer in heat exchangers, which is meant to maximize efficiency and effectiveness. The course will teach you about basic thermal and hydraulic analysis, tubular heat exchangers, as well as plate fin heat exchangers. You will also learn about direct contact heat exchangers, regenerators, heat pipes, phase change heat exchangers, heat exchanger testing and more.

This course will be of interest to mechanical engineering students or design professionals, or those looking to enhance their career prospects in industry. Start this course today and learn more about heat exchangers, their fundamentals and design analysis.
